snippet: The International Criminal Court on Thursday ordered Ivory Coast to hand over the country’s former first lady, Simone Gbagbo, to face charges of crimes against humanity.
abstract: Ivory Coast is ordered by International Criminal Court to turn over Simone Gbagbo, country's former first lady, to face accusations of crimes against humanity, including murder, rape and persecution.
lead_paragraph: The International Criminal Court on Thursday ordered Ivory Coast to hand over the country’s former first lady, Simone Gbagbo, to face charges of crimes against humanity.

headline.main: Ivory Coast: International Court Wants to Try Ex-President’s Wife
headline.print_headline: Ivory Coast: International Court Wants to Try Ex-President’s Wife

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
